name: PromptLoop
headline: AI for market research and analysis
description:
PromptLoop helps GTM teams automate account research and data enrichment at scale. We turn manual web scraping and qualification workflows into automated processes, enabling teams to enrich thousands of accounts with detailed company data and buying intent markers in minutes.

Why PromptLoop? Sales and marketing teams traditionally spend hours manually researching accounts or rely on outdated data providers. We automatically crawl and extract precise data points from company websites, social profiles, and public sources at 10% the cost of manual research, with built-in quality controls and strict sourcing. Teams can process 10k+ accounts simultaneously, turning raw URLs into actionable qualification data tailored to your goals.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:sales; industry:market-research; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Peter Mangan, Founder
founders.description: Building PromptLoop to make it 10x easier to pull insights from the internet and research companies. Previously, I worked at an organization reducing systemic cyber risk, as a quantitative analyst for a family office and as a consultant. I enjoy history, reading and being outside kiteboarding, painting, or just enjoying a sunny run around town.

founders.name: Andrew Mangan, Co-Founder
founders.description: Andrew loves history, math, and solving hard problems. He suffered a spinal cord injury in high school and after recovering from paralysis, is even more excited about living every day to the fullest.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: PromptLoop**

PromptLoop is a cutting-edge startup founded in 2022 and based in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco. As a participant in Y Combinator's Batch W22, it is on a mission to revolutionize market research and analysis through intelligent automation. The core idea? To harness the power of AI to transform time-consuming manual tasks into efficient, automated workflows.

**What Does PromptLoop Do?**

Sales and marketing teams are often bogged down by the need to manually research prospects and analyze data—a process that can drain hours and yield outdated information. PromptLoop offers a solution by automating account research and data enrichment at scale. With its platform, users can effortlessly scrape and organize data from websites, social profiles, and other public sources, outputting precise company data and buying intent markers at a fraction of the cost—10% to be exact—of traditional manual methods.

Imagine being able to enrich thousands of accounts with accurate data in mere minutes, while simultaneously watching costs drop dramatically. PromptLoop allows teams to process over 10,000 accounts simultaneously, turning raw URLs into actionable insights tailored to meeting specific business goals. 

**Key Features and Benefits:**

- **Automated Research:** Say goodbye to hours spent sifting through information. With built-in quality controls and strict data sourcing, you get reliable results every time.
- **AI-Powered Insights:** Leverage multiple AI models designed to deliver the most relevant insights. This means better targeting and a higher success rate in your outreach efforts.
- **Fast Implementation:** Onboarding can typically be completed in under an hour, getting your team up to speed quickly.
- **User-Friendly Interface:** PromptLoop integrates seamlessly with tools like Excel and Google Sheets, enabling users to interact with their data in familiar environments.

**Who Uses PromptLoop?**

The platform is gaining traction among various fast-growing teams and organizations looking to scale their marketing and sales efforts. It facilitates efficient data management, which is increasingly critical in today's fast-paced business landscape. 

Multiple testimonials underscore this sentiment, with users praising how PromptLoop has transformed their approach to data-driven marketing.

**The Team Behind PromptLoop**

Currently, PromptLoop comprises a small but agile team of two, operating under the guidance of Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne. Their nimble setup positions them to innovate quickly and respond to market needs effectively.

**In Conclusion**

PromptLoop is not just another SaaS tool; it's a comprehensive solution designed for the modern sales and marketing landscape, ensuring teams can access and utilize insights at an unprecedented pace and accuracy. If you're buried in account research, it might be time to check out PromptLoop. With its promise of efficiency and cost-effectiveness, it could very well be the game-changer your organization needs. 

For more information, visit [PromptLoop's website](https://www.promptloop.com/).
